publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5338 Hugh Henry: Protection of Vulnerable Groups (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Protection of Vulnerable Groups (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Robert Brown*
